facultyName: School of Engineering, Computing and Mathematical Science
description: The MSc Data Science is a conversion MSc, designed for students from a broad range of disciplines who wish to enhance their existing knowledge and skills in order to open up career opportunities in Data Science.
duration: 14 months full time, 28 months part time
fees: FeesHome - Full-time - £8395 per year Home - Part-time - £4198 per year International - Full-time - £15450 per year
